title: Africa: Dangote's World Class Refinery and Nigeria's Carbon Footprint
description: [allAfrica] Following the delivery of two million barrels of crude oil as part of the requirements for its takeoff, the Dangote refinery will steam to an historic start in early 2024.

title: Africa: Mentorship Key to Building Africa's Research Capacity
description: [SciDev.Net] This article was supported by the O.R. Tambo Africa Research Chairs Initiative.

title: Africa: Morocco, Senegal Supports Early Completion of $25bn Nigeria-Morocco Gas Pipeline
description: [Leadership] Morocco and Senegal have engaged in discussions for more support towards seamless execution of the $25 billion Nigeria- Morocco gas pipeline project.

title: Africa: Black Stars Looking to Shine Bright in Cote d'Ivoire.
description: [CAF] Boasting an array of exciting talent, coupled with the invaluable experience of its more seasoned campaigners, next month's TotalEnergies CAF Africa Cup of Nations, Cote d'Ivoire 2023 could possibly be the year the Black Stars shine bright on the continent.

title: Africa: Countries Reliant on India's Rice Hit With Skyrocketing Prices
description: [VOA] Washington -- Arnong Mungoei has farmed rice in Thailand's Khon Kaen province for half a century.

title: Africa: Several Dead After Rain Triggers Flash Floods
description: [DW] A 10-meter (33 feet) deluge swept through a borough of Ladysmith in South Africa, destroying homes and cars. Rescuers are battling to find survivors as rainstorms continue.

title: Africa: 2023 Marked By Achievements and Avoidable Suffering - WHO Chief
description: [UN News] The past year saw significant milestones and challenges in global public health but also immense and avoidable suffering, the Director-General of the World Health Organization (WHO) said on Tuesday.
